title: Original-Owner Euro 1980 Mercedes-Benz 280SL 5-Speed
description: This 1980 Mercedes-Benz 280SL is a European-market example that was purchased new in Germany by the seller's father, and the car was sent to the US later that year. It is finished in Classic White over Black MB-Tex and powered by a 2.7-liter inline-six paired with a five-speed manual transmission. Equipment includes European-specification lighting and bumpers as well as four-wheel disc brakes, 14" Bundt alloy wheels, a black convertible soft top, a Becker cassette stereo, and dual-zone automatic climate control. This R107 shows 73k miles and is now offered with manufacturer's literature, a tool kit, a removable hardtop, and a clean Florida title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a Original-Owner Euro 1980 Mercedes-Benz 280SL 5-Speed at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #180,887.
text: This 1980 Mercedes-Benz 280SL is a European-market example that was purchased new in Germany by the seller’s father, and the car was sent to the US later that year. This 1980 Mercedes-Benz 280SL is a European-market example that was purchased new in Germany by the seller’s father, and the car was sent to the US later that year. It is finished in Classic White over Black MB-Tex and powered by a 2.7-liter inline-six paired with a five-speed manual transmission. Equipment includes European-specification lighting and bumpers as well as four-wheel disc brakes, 14″ Bundt alloy wheels, a black convertible soft top, a Becker cassette stereo, and dual-zone automatic climate control. This R107 shows 73k miles and is now offered with manufacturer’s literature, a tool kit, a removable hardtop, and a clean Florida title in the seller’s name.

The car is finished in Classic White (737) with European-specification lighting and bumpers, and it features a replacement black convertible soft top, fog lights, dual side mirrors, a power antenna, and polished aluminum trim. The sale includes a Classic White removable hardtop that can be seen in the gallery below.
